args.content:
import Mathlib

open Filter

/-- Suppose z0 âˆˆ â„‚. The limit of f(z) as z â†’ z0 is âˆž in the Riemann sphere (WithTop â„‚)
    iff for every M > 0 there exists Î´ > 0 such that |f(z)| > M whenever 0 < |z - z0| < Î´. -/
theorem tendsto_atTop_iff_forall_norm_gt {z0 : Complex} {f : Complex â†’ Complex} :
  Tendsto (fun z => (f z : WithTop Complex)) (nhdsWithin z0 {z | z â‰  z0}) atTop â†”
    âˆ€ M : â„, M > 0 â†’ âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ z, z â‰  z0 â†’ |z - z0| < Î´ â†’ M < |f z| := by
  sorry

args.query: tendsto atTop WithTop complex nhdsWithin mathlib4 tendsto_atTop_iff norm |f z| > M

import Mathlib

open Filter Metric Complex Set

/-- For z0 : â„‚ and f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚, show that lim_{zâ†’z0} f(z) = âˆž in the Riemann sphere (WithTop â„‚) iff for every M > 0 there exists Î´ > 0 such that |f z| > M whenever 0 < |z - z0| < Î´. Use nhdsWithin for the punctured neighborhood and nhds (âŠ¤ : WithTop â„‚) for the limit; end the statement with := by sorry. -/
theorem tendsto_nhdsWithin_punctured_iff_atTop {z0 : Complex} {f : Complex â†’ Complex} :
  Tendsto (fun z => (f z : WithTop Complex)) (nhdsWithin z0 {z | z â‰  z0}) (ð“ (âŠ¤ : WithTop Complex)) â†”
    âˆ€ M : â„, M > 0 â†’ âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ z, z â‰  z0 â†’ |z - z0| < Î´ â†’ M < |f z| := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

open Filter Metric

/-- For z0 : â„‚ and f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚, lim_{zâ†’z0} f(z) = âˆž (equivalently |f(z)| â†’ âˆž) iff for every M > 0 there exists Î´ > 0 such that |f(z)| > M whenever 0 < |z - z0| < Î´. -/
theorem tendsto_norm_atTop_iff {z0 : Complex} {f : Complex â†’ Complex} :
  Tendsto (fun z => Complex.abs (f z)) (nhdsWithin z0 {z | z â‰  z0}) atTop â†”
    âˆ€ M : â„, M > 0 â†’ âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ z, z â‰  z0 â†’ Complex.abs (z - z0) < Î´ â†’ M < Complex.abs (f z) := by
  sorry
